Wand makes gaming magical. Through game customization and guidance, we build tools that helps players have more fun in their favorite games.Our platform works across thousands of PC games, ensuring that great games are accessible to everyone, regardless of time constraints, skill level, or accessibility needs. We want to build the future of game assistance, and we're hoping you'll join us.About UsAt Wand, we're on a mission to make gaming more fun. We're building the world's ultimate game companion, where millions of PC gamers discover mind-blowing ways to play their favorite games. Founded with a community-first approach, Wand has become the go-to destination for gamers seeking safe and seamless ways to enhance their gaming experience.Our platform unites cutting-edge technology with unwavering security, transforming how players interact with games through innovative features like interactive maps and real-time mods. What drives us is our deep commitment to the gaming community and our belief that everyone deserves access to extraordinary gaming experiences. We are all gamers at heart, dedicated to building a platform that continually surprises and delights our users.Role OverviewDo you love playing single-player video games and dream of making a living doing so?We're seeking passionate QA Testers to help ensure our community has access to reliable, high-quality gaming experiences. This role focuses on testing and validating mods to enhance gameplay while maintaining Wand's commitment to safety and quality.Key ResponsibilitiesTest and validate game modifications across a wide range of PC titlesMeet established performance metrics and testing KPIsDocument and report findings with detailed attention to functionality and user experienceProvide structured feedback to improve mod instructions and descriptionsWho You AreA dedicated gamer with a deep understanding of video game mechanicsStrong attention to detail and systematic approach to testingExcellent written and verbal communication skills in EnglishStable high-speed internet connection (100Mb/s minimum)PC capable of running modern games and recording gameplay footageExperience using Discord for team collaborationSelf-motivated with strong time management skillsBonus PointsExperience with Wand or similar modding platformsBackground in software testing or quality assuranceKnowledge of recording and streaming softwareWhat we offerThe opportunity to play cutting-edge video games and explore immersive worlds as your job!Competitive compensationA flexible work environment that caters to your gaming scheduleA chance to be part of a passionate community of gamers and creatorsHow To ApplyPlease submit your resume along with:Detailed PC specifications:Storage capacityRAMProcessorGraphics cardInternet speedJoin us in creating the ultimate PC gaming companion!Wand is an equal opportunity employer committed to building a diverse and inclusive team. We welcome applications from all qualified candidates regardless of background.
